statements: UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_result = true WHERE employee_id = 1001;
UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_notes = 'Updated notes' WHERE compliance_type = 'Training';

UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_result = FALSE, compliance_date = '2022-10-20', compliance_notes = 'Non-compliance due to missing safety gear' WHERE employee_id = 102
UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE incident_reports SET reported_by = 'John Doe', incident_description = 'Fire emergency' WHERE report_id = 101;
UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_status = TRUE, department = 'Production' WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE incident_reports SET incident_description = 'Equipment malfunction', report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE reported_by = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_type='Safety Training' WHERE id=1
UPDATE safety_incidents SET incident_description='Minor incident on the factory floor' WHERE incident_id=100
UPDATE safety_compliance_data SET compliance_type = 'Updated Compliance Type', violation_description = 'Updated Violation Description' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE safety_reports SET report_text = 'Incident report filed' WHERE report_id = 101;

UPDATE safety_trainings SET training_date='2022-10-05', training_title='Fire Safety Training' WHERE trainer_name='Jane Smith';
UPDATE Safety_Team SET team_name = 'Emergency Response Team', team_lead = 'John Doe', team_size = 10 WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
